title: Unseen horizons
creator_credit: Bernard Till, Terry Ashwood and Associated British-Pathe
brief_description: A complete primary, secondary and specialised vocational educational system for the blind is maintained in Great Britain by the Royal National Institute for the Blind. All types of schools provided are shown.
